properties.name: global
properties.help: find all matches rather than stopping after the first match

properties.name: multiline
properties.help:
treat beginning and end characters (^ and $) as working over multiple lines (i.e., match the beginning or end of each line (delimited by 
 or ), not only the very beginning or end of the whole input string)

properties.name: unicode
properties.help: treat pattern as a sequence of unicode code points

properties.name: sticky
properties.help: matches only from the index indicated by the lastIndex property of this regular expression in the target string (and does not attempt to match from any later indexes).
